title: Status Correction and Identity
summary: Learn how to reclaim your lawful name and status, moving from a corporate PERSON back to a living man or woman on the land.

questions.question: What is the corporate PERSON?
options: A legal fiction created by registration

questions.question: Why must status correction be recorded publicly?
options: To give lawful notice and establish your standing

questions.question: Where does your lawful name exist?
options: On the land and soil jurisdiction

questions.question: The act of 'reconveyance' means:
options: Moving property or title back from sea to land jurisdiction

questions.question: A lawful man or woman stands under which law?
What document typically accompanies your reconveyance?
Why must witnesses sign your reconveyance?
options: To affirm it was done knowingly and lawfully

questions.question: Who controls the corporate PERSON before status correction?
After correction, who holds lawful title to your estate?
options: You, the living man or woman
